data.name: Crest - Art Book
data.detailed_description:
This is part of our support package plan for Crest where you can help us in our Early Access effort, and getting something nice in return. This is a high quality PDF book compiled and written by the art director of the game, showing you the process of the first two years, 2013 - 2015. Will be updated after the full launch of the game.


To access the art book after purchase go to the same folder where you can find Crest (Game Library>Properties>Browse Local Files...).
data.about_the_game:
This is part of our support package plan for Crest where you can help us in our Early Access effort, and getting something nice in return. This is a high quality PDF book compiled and written by the art director of the game, showing you the process of the first two years, 2013 - 2015. Will be updated after the full launch of the game.


To access the art book after purchase go to the same folder where you can find Crest (Game Library>Properties>Browse Local Files...).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 graphics memory and shader model 2.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF Reader

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 graphics memory and shader model 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF Reader

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 graphics memory and shader model 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF Reader
